message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LT, cs.FL. 

The paper deals with logical characterization and graphical representation of system specifications, which suggests that it could belong to the Logic in Computer Science (cs.LO) sub-category. The use of modal logic and modal transition systems also points towards the Programming Languages (cs.PL) and Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-categories. The paper also discusses refinement over state-transition models, which could place it in the sub-category of Logic and Verification (cs.LT). Finally, the paper deals with bisimulation, which is a topic in Formal Languages and Automata Theory (cs.FL).
